title: Understanding Discovery Infrastructure
text: Discovery infrastructure on the PULL side involves tools and methods to gather metadata from various sources. It ensures that data is collected efficiently and accurately.

title: Components of PULL Side
text: The PULL side uses different components like crawlers, event-based listeners, and bespoke tools to manage data collection.

hintAnswer: Crawlers that periodically collect information from metadata sources
title: Crawlers
text: Crawlers are automated programs that periodically collect information from metadata sources. They are essential for keeping data up-to-date.
choices: Crawlers that periodically collect information from metadata sources
Other bespoke tools are necessary given the volume and diversity of data most companies are grappling with
Event based listeners for near real time metadata collection to capture time sensitive information such as data quality or metadata versioning

hintAnswer: Event based listeners for near real time metadata collection to capture time sensitive information such as data quality or metadata versioning
title: Event-Based Listeners
text: Event-based listeners capture time-sensitive information like data quality or metadata versioning in near real-time.
choices: Crawlers that periodically collect information from metadata sources
Other bespoke tools are necessary given the volume and diversity of data most companies are grappling with
Event based listeners for near real time metadata collection to capture time sensitive information such as data quality or metadata versioning

hintAnswer: Other bespoke tools are necessary given the volume and diversity of data most companies are grappling with
title: Bespoke Tools
text: Given the volume and diversity of data, companies often require custom tools to handle specific data collection needs.
choices: Crawlers that periodically collect information from metadata sources
Other bespoke tools are necessary given the volume and diversity of data most companies are grappling with
Event based listeners for near real time metadata collection to capture time sensitive information such as data quality or metadata versioning

title: All Components Together
text: The PULL side of discovery infrastructure uses a combination of crawlers, event-based listeners, and bespoke tools to effectively manage data collection.
choices: Crawlers that periodically collect information from metadata sources
Other bespoke tools are necessary given the volume and diversity of data most companies are grappling with
Event based listeners for near real time metadata collection to capture time sensitive information such as data quality or metadata versioning
